text: A child marriage that was scheduled for February 5 was stopped by the timely intervention of officials here. Based on a tip-off received by the officials from Childline, a team led by Special Sub-Inspector of Anti-Human Trafficking Wing Tamilselvi, Amudha from Childline, Village Administrative Officer Vennila and officials from District Child Protection Unit visited the girl’s house in Devanankurichi on Thursday night. The 15-year-old girl was to be married off to a 33-year-old man at temple in Tharamangalam in Salem. Officials warned both the parents.
title: Child marriage stopped
